comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Baron Zdenko Von Dworzak, former physician to the court of Wilhelm II, married Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis; they lived in Florence, Italy. He was her second husband; he first husband was Thomas Peck (thus the name confusion by the original captioner). She shared a name with Martha Washington's granddaughter, because she was a descendant of Nelly Custis: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleanor_Parke_Custis_Lewis en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Parke_Custis_Lewis

comment.author: 31205011@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] Good information and clarification; thank you.
